name: Leisure yacht - The epilogue
description: Leisure yacht - the epilogue is an adult visual novel. Michael, the Main Character, spent the whole summer on a very luxurious yacht. But the summer ended and now it's time to come back on the mainland. Before leaving, Michael decided to say goodbye to some of his travel companions, greeting them in the best way he knows! Leisure yacht - the epilogue is a 2D visual novel based on a multiple choice system that will change the developing of the story. There are 400 images in game in full HD, some animations and two minigames!
